reviewText:
I watched this during my own childhood, and it was as good as I remembered - a wonderful explanation of Easter and what it means to the Christian faith. Simply and beautifully explains to young kids how to take their problems to God, and while things may not turn out the way they want them to all the time, he does understand how they feel. A must-have for any Christian child's library - and a refreshing alternative to the bunny stuff (and yet it doesn't run down those fun traditions, either).

J.W.
